>Construction of pLYC17
acquire oligo ZH17			
acquire oligo ZH17R
acquire oligo ZH2
acquire oligo ZH2R
acquire oligo ZH18
acquire oligo ZH18R
acquire plasmid pLYC10
acquire genomic_dna MG1655_dxs
PCR ZH17,ZH2R on pLYC10	(3476 bp, pcrA17)
PCR ZH2,ZH18R on pLYC10	(4849 bp, pcrB17)
PCR ZH18,ZH17R on MG1655_dxs (1941 bp, pcrC17)
Assemble pcrA17,pcrB17,pcrC17	(Gibson, pLYC17)
Transform pLYC17	(Mach1, Amp)
